21 namespace libmolgrid {
22 
32 class ExampleExtractor {
33 
34  std::vector<CoordCache> coord_caches; //different typers have duplicated caches
35  bool duplicate_poses = false;
36 
37  size_t count_types(unsigned n) const;
38  public:
39 
40  ExampleExtractor(const ExampleProviderSettings& settings, std::shared_ptr<AtomTyper> t) {
41  coord_caches.push_back(CoordCache(t, settings, settings.recmolcache));
42  }
43 
44  ExampleExtractor(const ExampleProviderSettings& settings, std::shared_ptr<AtomTyper> t1, std::shared_ptr<AtomTyper> t2) {
45  coord_caches.push_back(CoordCache(t1, settings, settings.recmolcache));
46  coord_caches.push_back(CoordCache(t2, settings, settings.ligmolcache));
47  }
48 
49  ExampleExtractor(const ExampleProviderSettings& settings,
50  const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<AtomTyper> >& typrs,
51  const std::vector<std::string>& molcaches = std::vector<std::string>()) {
52  coord_caches.reserve(typrs.size());
53  if(typrs.size() == 0) throw std::invalid_argument("Need at least one atom typer for example extractor");
54  for(unsigned i = 0, n = typrs.size(); i < n; i++) {
55  if(i < molcaches.size()) {
56  coord_caches.push_back(CoordCache(typrs[i], settings, molcaches[i]));
57  } else {
58  coord_caches.push_back(CoordCache(typrs[i], settings));
59  }
60  }
61  }
62 
63  virtual ~ExampleExtractor() {}
64 
66  virtual void extract(const ExampleRef& ref, Example& ex);
67 
70  // if implicit typing is being used
71  virtual size_t num_types() const;
72 
73  // return number types (channels) ref will produce
74  virtual size_t num_types(const ExampleRef& ref) const;
75 
78  virtual std::vector<std::string> get_type_names() const;
79 };
80 
81 } /* namespace libmolgrid */
82 
83 #endif /* EXAMPLE_EXTRACTOR_H_ */
